articles.title: Bruce Willis’ Wife Emma Thanks Fans For ‘Love & Compassion’ After Actor’s Aphasia Diagnosis - HollywoodLife
articles.description: One day after Bruce Willis' family revealed that the actor had been diagnosed with aphasia, his wife, Emma Heming, shared a new message about how 'grateful' she is for the love and support from fans.

articles.title: Meet Daleep Singh, US official who said Russia won't come to India's defence if China violates LAC - India Today
articles.description: The great grand-nephew of the first Asian-American elected to the US Congress, Daleep Singh is the Biden administration's point person on economic sanctions.

articles.title: Police offered to arrest Will Smith, Oscars producer says - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The authorities did not take any action because Chris Rock declined to press charges.

articles.title: What's aphasia, the condition that's led Bruce Willis to retire? - 1News
articles.description: Aphasia is a little-known condition that has many possible causes.
articles.content:
